title: Language Acquisition Simulation Course Applying a Systematic Training Model

context.additional_context: A process of experiencing language use scenarios similar to real-life situations in a VR environment, applying a step-by-step designed training model to systematically develop learners' language proficiency.

learning_goals: Learners can use over 500 basic vocabulary items required for daily life with 80% or higher accuracy through VR simulation.
Learners apply conversational strategies suitable for over 10 real-life scenarios (shopping, travel, work, etc.) in a simulated environment with a success rate of over 70%.
Learners reduce grammatical errors by over 50% and implement appropriate intonation/stress patterns by over 60% when using the language.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
